meanings.definition: A person who distrains or seizes property in order to enforce a legal claim.
meanings.sent1: The distrainors arrived at the property to take back what was owed.
meanings.sent2: The distrainors were authorized to seize the belongings as part of the legal process.
meanings.sent3: The distrainors joked about being modern-day treasure hunters as they searched for valuable items.
meanings.sent4: The distrainors were like diligent detectives tracking down the missing pieces of evidence.
meanings.sent5: The image of the distrainors hauling away the furniture stuck in the minds of the onlookers.
